short_summary: Supply and delivery of one wireless Mobile Column Lift System
description: Inspect, maintain and repair heavy equipment, e.g. trucks etc.
full_summary:
### Wireless Mobile Column Lift System
#### Request for Proposal
Transport Canada, Penticton Airport, requires the supply and delivery of one wireless Mobile Column Lift System (MCLS) with an option to purchase an additional system for the Transport Canada, Port Hardy Airport.

**Tender Details**
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3806739546
* **Publication Date:** December 29, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** January 18, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** January 31, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2023

**Key Features and Specifications**
The MCLS will be used to inspect, maintain, and repair heavy equipment such as trucks. The system must be delivered to Penticton Airport by March 31, 2023.

**Trade Agreements**
This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

**Regions of Delivery**
The winning contractor will be required to deliver the MCLS to:
* British Columbia, Canada

**Procurement Information**
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Notice Number:** WS3806739546
* **Notice URL:** [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15008588?extsite=MTUwMDg1ODhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15008588?extsite=MTUwMDg1ODhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Contact Information**
For more information on this tender, please contact:
Yu, Daphne (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: [daphne.yu@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:daphne.yu@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Phone: None
Fax: None
